name: ytdl-sub
tagline: A subscription based automation tool for yt-dlp
description: ytdl-sub is a self-hosted, automation-focused wrapper for yt-dlp that subscribes to channels and playlists, periodically downloading new content according to defined rules.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Set criteria for which videos to download based on title, duration, upload date, or metadata

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize downloads with naming conventions and folder structures compatible with Plex and Jellyfin

features.title: Incremental Downloads
features.description: Only fetch new videos since the last run to minimize bandwidth and processing time

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Create metadata files for media servers with episode numbers, descriptions, and artwork

features.title: Thumbnail Management
features.description: Download and organize video thumbnails as poster images for media library displays
